data.system_settings: Windows 10 x64, Intel HD Graphics 530, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M
data.actual_result: Discord Overlay does not appear. It is still locked on the second display, even though it is not connected.
data.expected_result: Discord Overlay should appear on the primary screen in-game.
data.short_description: Discord Overlay won't appear on primary display after using secondary display (laptop)
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect a second screen to the HDMI port - Use Winkey + P to open the project menu - Select "Second screen only" - Open Discord desktop client - Launch any game that has overlay enabled - Close game and Discord completely - Disconnect second screen - Reopen Discord client - Launch the same game
